responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "31C45E7045AF6BC07D3850990A93C063", "The Horn of Doom is an ancient relic of war used by the Great Unifier, King Jarrak to decimate legions of minotaur with but a single bellow from the horn. It is rumored to have been buried with the remains of the king, yet no one has yet to find it. We of the war council belive it rests in the dungeons of Thanalas.  ")
name: MADD_0005B_HOD_CaptainEudoxia_9
